module.name: avm-res-resources-resourcegroup
module.description: To gain access, please finish setting up this repository now at:

inputs.name: lock
role_assignments
inputs.type:
map(object({
    role_definition_id_or_name             = string
    principal_id                           = string
    description                            = optional(string, null)
    skip_service_principal_aad_check       = optional(bool, false)
    condition                              = optional(string, null)
    condition_version                      = optional(string, null)
    delegated_managed_identity_resource_id = optional(string, null)
    principal_type                         = optional(string, null)
  }))

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the resource group

outputs.name: resource
outputs.description: This is the full output for the resource group.

outputs.name: resource_id
outputs.description: The resource Id of the resource group
